Description: Gold brooch; convex disk, backed with flat plate; bordered with beaded wire; front of plate set with oval plasma surrounded by four smaller plasmas; on the back a hinged pin and catch.
Bibliographic references: Jewellery / Catalogue of the Jewellery, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum. (2865)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
